class.name: OScriptNodeNew
class.experimental: This node is experimental and may change in the future.
class.brief_description: Creates a new instance of a specific object type.
class.description: The [OScriptNodeNew] node creates a new instance of a specific object type, similar to using GDScript's [method Object.new] method. The object type that will be created is specified by modifying the [param class_name] property in the inspector.
